mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "ORDER" JOIN ORDER_PROD OP USING (ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PR USING (PROD_NO) JOIN IMAGE IG ON (PROD_NO = REF_NO) ORDER BY PROD_NO DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NO, C.COUPON_NO, TO_CHAR(validity_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as validity_date, status, C.COUPON_NAME, C.DISCOUNT_RATE, C.DISCOUNT FROM COUPON_USER CU JOIN COUPON C ON (CU.COUPON_NO = C.COUPON_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND VALIDITY_DATE > SYSDATE AND STATUS = 'Y'
